definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: The synonymous reduplication is a unique linguistic phenomenon in Korean.
sentences.chinese: 同義疊加是朝鮮語特有的一種語言現象。

sentences.english: Wh-question is one of the interrogative forms both in English and Korean.
sentences.chinese: 特殊疑問句是英語和朝鮮語共有的一種疑問句形式。

sentences.english: There're many correspondent synonyms between connatural Korean words and those in ancient Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮語固有詞與漢語有同義詞羣對應關係。

sentences.english: No verb-complement structure in Korean language;
sentences.chinese: 受朝鮮語沒有動補結構的影響。

sentences.english: Represents a single Hangul or alphabet AutoCorrect exception.
sentences.chinese: 代表一個朝鮮語或字母自動更正例外。

sentences.english: There're many regular patterns of phonetic and semantic correspondences between connatural Korean words and those in ancient Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮語的一些固有詞與漢語詞有音義對應關係。

sentences.english: Korean was also banned in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 同時在工廠朝鮮語亦被禁止使用。

sentences.english: His mother tongue was Korean but spoke fluent English.
sentences.chinese: 他的母語是朝鮮語，但英語流利。

sentences.english: There are Chinese characters found in Korean and Vietnamese.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮語越南語之中也同樣有漢字的身影。

sentences.english: Korean: The language of the Koreans, possibly in the Altaic family.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮語朝鮮人講的語言，可能屬於阿爾泰語系。

sentences.english: I can speak Japanese, Korean and English.
sentences.chinese: 我講日語，朝鮮語和英語。
